sentence.Network_en: A bloodstain is orange after you wash it three or four times.
sentence.Network_cn: 血迹你洗过三四次后就会变成橘黄色.

sentence.Network_en: He also helps instruct others in the science every year at his Bloodstain Evidence Institute.
sentence.Network_cn: 他还每年在他的血迹证据学会里帮助指导其他人.

list.abs: I think bloodstain analysis is being used and abused more and more , " he said . " Of my students , there are about five Frankensteins .一部分原因是科学会被误解为很简单。血液分析的基本前提是一小滴血的大小能显示出使用了多大能量，它的形状能说明它的来源方向，它的分布能显示出离血滴的地方有多远。

entry.def: A bloodstain is a mark on a surface caused by blood.

auth_sentence.content: Scientists used to require a large bloodstain and a couple of months to get a profile from a crime scene.
